name: atl0cl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqeltrd(c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), wcel(c0, cal))
stmt.pretty: eqeltrd(c1, c2, ((glb ` c0)` c2), c0 ∈ AtLat)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cal), wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 =((glb ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat →((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cal), wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 =((glb ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat →((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)

stmt.origin: p0val(c0, cal, c1, cfv(cglb, c0), c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cp0, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 =((glb ` c0)` c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (glb ` c0)=(glb ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(0. ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))

-| wceq(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cp0, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat →((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (glb ` c0)=(glb ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(0. ` c0)

stmt.origin: glbcl(cfv(cglb, c0), c2, c2, c0, cal, wcel(c0, cal))
stmt.pretty: glbcl((glb ` c0), c2, c2, c0, cal, c0 ∈ AtLat)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c0, cal))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cglb, c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat →((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (glb ` c0)=(glb ` c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c0 ∈ AtLat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c2 ∈ dom((glb ` c0)))

cumulated.origin:

⊣ (glb ` c0)=(glb ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(0. ` c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c0 ∈ AtLat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c2 ∈ dom((glb ` c0)))

comment: An atomic lattice has a zero element. We can use this in place of ~ op0cl for lattices without orthocomplements. (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
